name: Computer Science Engineering
description: Focuses on computing, algorithms, AI, and modern software development.

name: Information Technology
description: IT focuses on software systems, network technologies, and information management.

name: Electronics & Communication Engineering
description: Covers electronics, embedded systems, and communication technologies.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: Mechanical engineering covers machines, production, thermodynamics and materials.

name: Civil Engineering
description: Deals with construction, structures, environmental and geotechnical engineering.

name: Master of Business Administration
description: Focuses on business, finance, marketing, HR and management.
